Question
========

Suppose that if rain is expected the probability is 70% that it will will actually rain. If **no** rain is expected the probability is 20% that it will rain. Rain is expected for 10% of the days of the next month. What is the probability that it will rain?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,07
* 0,18
* 0,25
* 0,80

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.07: Incorrect
* 0.18: Incorrect
* 0.25: Correct
* 0.80: Incorrect
